thread.section_title: TerraTrike Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TerraTrike | www.terratrike.com
thread.title: Robert Ottobre :

author: Robert Ottobre :
title: Robert Ottobre :
text:
Needed tires, tubes and accessories. Made one phone call to Tyler at Customer Service and order was processed and it arrived 2 days later.
Items were what we wanted and expected from Terra Trike. We have 2 Ramblers and 1 Rover to keep enjoying. Thanks to Terra Trike we were able to ride on the first 75 degree day Feb 2017 instead of waiting till April
Thanks guys!
We are still enjoying retirement with our Trikes.
